title: BitcoinGirl.Club
author: BitcoinGirl.Club
content: This is when I am logged in: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2593173;sa=showPostsThis is when I am a guest: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=2593173;sa=showPostsWhat is f**king wrong with my account. Obviously a hero member is not going to have only 4 pages of post history. How the F*** ðŸ¤£

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: LoyceMobile on July 19, 2022, 07:26:43 PMIgnoring a lot of boards?Why didn't I realize it before ðŸ¤£? You are genius my AI brother.A few days ago I refreshed my ignore list and added a lot of boards too. I had no idea this was causing the post history too of users LOL.
